title: Elegant Emerald & Diamond Haaram with Pearl Accents
materials: Cultured Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: Intricate floral and petal designs set with dazzling diamonds create a mesmerizing pattern. The Emerald accents throughout the necklace and the large pendant add a pop of color and regal charm. Delicate pearl drops enhance the elegance of the Haaram. The setting is a combination of prong and pave, showcasing the brilliance of the diamonds. The pendant features a larger, central Emerald stone.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
and grand receptions. A perfect heirloom piece for generations.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls creates a stunning and sophisticated look. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and makes it a durable investment. The design blends traditional motifs with modern sensibilities, making it a versatile piece for various occasions. The use of high-quality diamonds and emeralds guarantees brilliance and value.
